website_summaries.verdict: Reasonable price for a kneeboard that includes plenty of padding.
pros: Padding in the base makes the ride smoother on your knees
Adjustable and padded strap keeps you safe while riding
Fins are molded into the board for keeping you on a straight line
Hook at front makes it easy to tow

customer_reviews.title: Great knee board for price.
customer_reviews.text: This was my first knee board purchase so I didn't really know what to expect. Good quality for the price. Has a good weight and size. Feels good to ride. The knee grooves are nice and deep and soft. The hook for the rope is small but my rope handle stayed on just fine. I was able to get up and ride (for a short time) when I haven't even tried in ten years.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin and Paul

customer_reviews.title: Excellent board
customer_reviews.text: Love this board. Both my daughters(7&9) were able to get up on their knees with a couple tries. The handle holder is awsome, it even allows me 200lbs to get up with out having to hold handle. Also you can place handle back on holder for a quick break on the arms without stopping, just pick it back up when ready while the boat is at speed. Wish they had this when I was a kid. This is my kids favorite water equiptment.
customer_reviews.author: colton wiseman

customer_reviews.title: Very good buy.
customer_reviews.text: Both of my kids (ages 17 and 10) got up on the first try! I was shocked. Use the knob in front to hook the handle bar on to and it simply pulls them along until they get their knees in the straps. Very good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Chad

customer_reviews.title: Works good
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son and he loves it seems to be a little harder to steady your self on then other ones we have had but once you get it figured out it works good
customer_reviews.author: Swamp hog

customer_reviews.title: My kids and their friends love this kneeboard
customer_reviews.text: My kids and their friends love this kneeboard! The strap is a little big but it my kids will only get bigger so it's perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Nutty mom

customer_reviews.title: not as appears
customer_reviews.text: this is navy blue in color, can barely tell the contrast of padding to board as picture shows...not that "pretty" blue at all
customer_reviews.author: sandra christina white

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Descent for the price. No retractive fins, and the pads for your knees are not soft. There really hard.
customer_reviews.author: Cordell Meiburg

customer_reviews.title: A little scratched
customer_reviews.text: Great product for beginners and intermediates. Giving this 4 stars since the bottom of the knee board came a little scratch but overall great product for the price
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: What an amazingly crafted product!
customer_reviews.text: This is a amazing product. Great look and feel. Affordable. We all love it and it definitely takes our boating to a new level! We can say enough about it.
customer_reviews.author: william simmon

customer_reviews.title: Works great! My 13 year old was able to kneeboard ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great! My 13 year old was able to kneeboard on his first attempt. Great for adults, too.
customer_reviews.author: Delina Wester

customer_reviews.title: This board either has several imperfections or was used
customer_reviews.text: Just received this board about an hour ago. I selected one-night shipping in anticipation to use it at the lake this weekend to find out this board has already been used. On the hook of the board around the corners are some rough edges as well as on the very top of the hook on the surface is a very rough texture/abrasions. In addition to this, on the top of the board is also some dry watermarks (not sure what else may indicate this board was used then that). The overall aesthetic of the board is sleek and appealing but I'm disappointed with the imperfections it carries for being a "new" board.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Very good board.
customer_reviews.text: Everyone is I enjoying the board. My son 16 and daughter 13 both were able to get up the first time. The hook is very easy for riders to adjust the strap on the Board while starting to move. Once we were up to speed they just grab the handle and go. Had this board for a month now and my son is already carving and jumping in the water. Used it with my boat and Waverunner and it worked great. I even was able to do it at 42, 185lbs!
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Fun!!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome!! My kids- 9 and 12- had a great time on this knee board. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The quality looks great for the money. Can't wait to try it!
customer_reviews.author: GKW2014

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use and fine for the kids
customer_reviews.text: Worked as described. Very easy to use and fine for the kids. Great board for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Sloopy

customer_reviews.title: My boys really like it and say it is well padded and comfortable ...
customer_reviews.text: We rented this knee board a couple times while at the lake before purchasing it. My boys really like it and say it is well padded and comfortable to use. Great for beginners to learn on.
customer_reviews.author: JL

customer_reviews.title: but daughter loved it out of box
customer_reviews.text: Have not had a chance to use, but daughter loved it out of box. Several kids I talked recommended this board, said hook was very useful for kids
customer_reviews.author: Charlie

customer_reviews.title: ... looking for a plastic kneeboard this one is probabaly fine. I however was looking for a composite one ...
customer_reviews.text: If you're looking for a plastic kneeboard this one is probabaly fine. I however was looking for a composite one and didn't realize it was cheap plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: I have always liked this kneeboard since we bought it the strap is ...
customer_reviews.text: I have always liked this kneeboard since we bought it the strap is easy to maneuver and it has nice padding. I liked the fact that it has a hook on the front because i teach people how to kneeboard and its a very useful addition to a board. this board is also easy to do tricks on and doesn’t tend to slide out from under you. very easy to control this board.
customer_reviews.author: Savannah scott

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great board for the money. very easy for beginners to get up on.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

product_meta.title: O'Brien Radica Kneeboard with Hook
product_meta.description: Taking cues from our already industry-leading kneeboard designs, we've blended wakeboard and water-ski design elements into the Radica to bring levels of performance previously unheard of at this price. Wakeboard-styled quad, cupped molded fins make edging and carving a breeze, while allowing release for spin-type tricks. The water-ski influenced edge bevel helps the bard sit low in the water for stability and allows quick edge to edge transitions when carving. From the built-in hook that makes getting up easy, to the super-stable ride that beginner and intermediate riders will love.
